descriptionHtml:
My first real attempt at creating a follower. I'm quite proud of him, so I thought I'd share him due to a sad lack of Argonian follower mods...

You will find him in Candlehearth Hall in Windhelm, and you can recruit him straight away. He's a Ranger, and thus uses bows primarily, along with one-handed weapons and light armour. He's also marriageable, essential and doesn't affect your stealth meter while also scaling along with your level.


Mods used in screenshots:
Drachis Argonian Retexture (Argonian Raptor feet compatible version)
Argonian Raptor Feet
Argonian Mercenary Armour
Bandolier - Bags and Pouches
Skyrim Scarves and Mufflers

ENB:
Stakado Cinemascope

(All of the above are available on the Nexus)
author: rramiel
